sn51.21:4.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn51.21:4.3: ‘ko nu kho maggo, kā paṭipadā iddhipādabhāvanāyā’ti?
sn51.21:4.6: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṃkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.21:4.8: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.21:4.9: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.21:4.10: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.21:4.11: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.21:4.15: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṃkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.21:4.17: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.21:4.18: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.21:4.19: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā’—
sn51.21:4.20: iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.21:5.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.21:5.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti … pe …
sn51.21:5.4: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
